report.title: On The Wire
report.author: Jpkirk
report.bodytext: Me and my cousins were bored one night. Tatum New Mexico is so small everything is just a bike ride away, so we went to town and country and bought a 2000 mg pack of ginseng juice. We went around the side of town and country and drank it all in 1 gulp. /n /n (8:00)no significant effect on the ride home, a little more energetic then usual. /n (8:30)change of mind state everything seems to be shifting. /n (9:00)weird feeling in our stomachs. /n (9:30)strung out all over the small room. /n (10:00)when we lay down it feels like an intense rush like were in a race car. /n (10:30)feeling nausious and a little buzzed. /n (11:00)coming down is like hell. /n (11:30)feeling tired my bro is on the computer. /n (12:00)I feel like I'm dead /n (11:00am)a bad hangover /n /n All together it was fun and a good party drug with some not so fun side effects. I may try it again but I'll research other things first.
